00047                 protected function my_morse_encode()
00048                 {
00049                         $this->response->body =
00050                                 Morse::encode($this->response->body);
00051                         $this->response->body =
00052                                 preg_replace(array(
00053                                         "/\./",
00054                                         "/\-/",
00055                                         ),
00056                                         array(
00057                                         "&middot;",
00058                                         "&mdash;",
00059                                         ),
00060                                         $this->response->body);
00061                 }
